text: The source of the Ebro in Fontibre. Fontibre is a locality of the municipality Hermandad de Campoo de Suso, in Cantabria. It is located 3 km from Reinosa. The source of the Ebro River is located in Fontibre. In fact, this name derives from the Latin words Fontes Iberis, source of the Ebro. Category:Populated places in Cantabria
title: Fontibre
